Parameters: @B_android#view#Window_E@
Window: The source from which to copy This value must never be null.
@B_android#graphics#Rect_E@
Rect: The area of the source to copy from. If this is null the copy area will be the entire surface. The rect will be clamped to the bounds of the Surface. This value may be null.
@B_android#graphics#Bitmap_E@
Bitmap: The destination of the copy. The source will be scaled to match the width, height, and format of this bitmap. This value must never be null.
@B_android#view#PixelCopy#OnPixelCopyFinishedListener_E@
PixelCopy.OnPixelCopyFinishedListener: Callback for when the pixel copy request completes This value must never be null.
@B_android#os#Handler_E@
Handler: The callback will be invoked on this Handler when the copy is finished. This value must never be null.
request(android.view.Window,android.grap.Description: Requests a copy of the pixels at the provided @B_android#graphics#Rect_E@ from a @B_android#view#Window_E@ to be copied into a provided @B_android#graphics#Bitmap_E@. The contents of the source rect will be scaled to fit exactly inside the bitmap. The pixel format of the source buffer will be converted, as part of the copy, to fit the the bitmap's @B_android#graphics#Bitmap#Config_E@. The most recently queued buffer in the Window's Surface will be used as the source of the copy. Note: This is limited to being able to copy from Window's with a non-null DecorView. If @B_android#view#Window#peekDecorView_E@ is null this throws an @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@. It will similarly throw an exception if the DecorView has not yet acquired a backing surface. It is recommended that @B_android#view#ViewTreeObserver#OnDrawListener_E@ is used to ensure that at least one draw has happened before trying to copy from the window, otherwise either an @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@ will be thrown or an error will be returned to the @B_android#view#PixelCopy#OnPixelCopyFinishedListener_E@.
request(android.view.Window,android.grap.FullName: public static void request (Window source, Rect srcRect, Bitmap dest, PixelCopy.OnPixelCopyFinishedListener listener, Handler listenerThread)

ClassDesc: Provides a mechanisms to issue pixel copy requests to allow for copy operations from @B_android#view#Surface_E@ to @B_android#graphics#Bitmap_E@
